channel.title: InspireRSPS | 718 | Great Features | Join Now!
channel.description:
Website: [URL=http://inspirersps.boards.net/]Forums[/URL]
Download: [URL=http://uppit.com/pfjhzxj6deoa/Inspire.jar]Client Download[/URL]
Donate: [URL=http://inspirersps.boards.net/thread/7/inspirersps-donations]Donation Page[/URL]
I would like to present to you, InspireRSPS. InspireRSPS started out as a project that a friend and I wanted to do a little work to a source, and release it to the world-wide web. So we stayed up for a couple of hours with a base, and decided to do some research, and add a few codes in here and there. You know some touch up work, and it still needs some more work done to it, and we're getting there. xD
This is a SPAWN Server: This means that you can spawn almost every item, although there are a few that will be for rewards which will be received from Donating to our server.
Some Updates that were recently added were: Some commands for Donators, and regular members, and fully working Castle Wars, and successfully added The Crucible feature.
Bosses/Minigames: Jad/Fight Pits/Kiln/Dominion Tower Bosses/KBD/QBD/Nomad/Duel Arena
[SPOILER=Some Minigame Media][IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/t4vi9g.jpg[/img][IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/33lp8nb.jpg[/img][IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/vcyr2u.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
Our combat system deep inside the files of InspireRSPS is outstanding, and is most definitely one of the best qualities of the server.

item.title: InspireRSPS | 718 | Great Features | Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

gl and above members have a point if your gonna make donator ranks dont add everything thats f2p for donators :palm: you need to add items such as certain customs, Donator capes, ect.

And I hate your forums just throwing that out there. You made it way too flashy.

Stick with simple SMF, or mybb or even IPB or vbulletin themes.

Read full topic

have to donate to be able to weild chaotics or torva da hell?

I agree, these servers that give an unfair advantage to donators are getting out of hand.
